title: Local Hour: Vin Scully's $15 Million Home
description:
Billy kicks off the show by proposing a hypothetical about accepting damage to your body for career advancement. Then, since Greg looks like Joe Maddon, the crew talks Marlins baseball. Plus, Mike breaks down the success of this Inter Miami season, Amin discusses the future of LeBron and the Lakers, and Vin Scully's old home is on the market for way more than we would've expected.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
